response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially securing this deal with you.", "product_price": 950000}
